name: Clip
description:
You Play as 'Clip' an engineer who's job it is to fix reality stabilizing crystals that are held at the top of towers. 
Climb the tower by switching between parallel dimensions causing yourself to clip into objects and be propelled upwards. 

This game was made for the United Game Jam, It fits the theme of 'Two' because of the two parallel dimensions the player switches between in order to navigate the level.

All Assets are created by us. bar the font we used 

Font, 'Bligh' : https://www.daltonmaag.com/
